[[inst_lhu_pcr]]
==== LHU.PCR

*Syntax:* lhu.pcr [symbol], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load unsigned 16-bit halfword from memory.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lhu_pcr.svg[LHU.PCR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA
